turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order three pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started. what did you want on those three pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like pepperoni and sausage on all three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want for those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want 3 small gluten free pizzas, all with pepperoni and sausage, is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. thanks for confirming. the total is $36.99. did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll b ready for u to pick it up in 35 mins.
